name: 艾普利·罗斯
introduction: Hometown Chicago. Out of high school, she became an EMT, worked with children and adults with disabilities, but her biggest impact was when she became a certified Sexual Assault Medical counselor on-call in 15 Chicago ERs. Cast member on MTV2s highest-rated show, Guy Code (2011). Creates, writes, hosts Maxim Magazines weekly show, Maximum Exposure (2000). Honored on Maxim's annual definitive list of world's most beautiful "Maxim Hot 100" of 2012. Featured on the cover of Maxim's first Canadian issue and serves as Maxim's main on-camera talent. Talent on Live Speed-FoxSports broadcasts & co-hosts Bears Pre-Game show on CSN. Can also be seen as a contributor for VH1 music count-downs.
